name: Clyde's Revenge
description: Help Clyde hunt through dark and deadly castles to find lost treasure and solve unforgiving tricks. To keep out of trouble, all you get is a magic floor-dissolving wand and whatever smarts you bring with you. You'll soon discover how addictive this double-parallax scrolling arcade adventure really is as you search for keys to locked doors, leap over lava pits, avoid traps, and more. Featuring a dynamite soundtrack, full digital sound effects, and nice graphics; CLYDE'S REVENGE will keep you on your toes as you search every last corner of each castle to find all the gems. Here's loads of fun for everyone who enjoys great arcade action!
